1359200.name: Roundabout 3 Soundtrack
1359200.description:
The adrenaline-pumping, fast paced, electronic soundtrack from Roundabout 3. Included are tracks from all 6 base levels in the game for your listening pleasure.

The musical genre could be described as electronic, dance, techno, or trance.

All the tracks included are purely instrumental - there are no lyrics or vocals.
The songs have tempos that are in the range of roughly 100 to 180 BPM.
Each track is provided as a 192kbps MP3 file.
The total combined duration is 22 minutes and 55 seconds.
